name: the ritual ii
description:
a sequel to the ritual. explore the woods again, this time to perform a ritual to undo the previous one.

features:

  • 6 distinct zones
  • lots of space to explore
  • meet a witch
  • useless items
  • useful items
  • 3 endings

 (walkthrough and game map included below if you're stuck)

made in bitsy by Adam Le Doux using bitsy savior by aloelazoe.

i used the edit room from dialog hack by Dana Holdampf as well as the dialog choices and dialog jump hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc.
